H0.text: Who did Roger Federer defeat in the final to win his first Wimbledon singles title in 2003. Andy Roddick

H1.text: Who did Roger Federer defeat in the final to win his first Wimbledon singles title in 2003. Lleyton Hewitt

H2.text: Who did Roger Federer defeat in the final to win his first Wimbledon singles title in 2003. Juan Carlos Ferrero

H3.text: Who did Roger Federer defeat in the final to win his first Wimbledon singles title in 2003. Philipousis

A4.text: At Wimbledon, Hewitt reached the semi-finals, but lost to eventual champion Federer.
